code: import Hammer from'@egjs/hammerjs';import IndiscreteGestureHandler from'./IndiscreteGestureHandler';class PinchGestureHandler extends IndiscreteGestureHandler{get name(){return'pinch';}get NativeGestureClass(){return Hammer.Pinch;}transformNativeEvent({scale,velocity,center}){return{focalX:center.x,focalY:center.y,velocity,scale};}}export default PinchGestureHandler;
